stork.core.handlers

Class Handler<R extends Request>

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.core.handlers.Handler<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of Request this handler handles.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CancelHandler, CredHandler, DeleteHandler, GetHandler, InfoHandler, ListHandler, MkdirHandler, QHandler, SubmitHandler, UserHandler

    public abstract class Handler<R extends Request>
extends Object
    Stork command handlers should extend this class.

      • requestForm

        public final R requestForm(String command)
        Return a new request form to be filled out. By default, this attempts to guess the type of the request object from the generic type.

        Override this to use a custom form constructor.
